content: This subsection allows you to change the look and feel of your space. You can use your own company logo, name and text to match your organization brand.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a description of customization options in the Portal Settings page. It provides context about changing the look and feel of your space to match an organization's brand. The translated content will appear as a label for this section.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'look and feel' is not accurately translated. 'شكل ومظهر' (shape and appearance) is a literal translation but doesn't fully convey the intended meaning of 'look and feel' in a design context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more nuanced translation for 'look and feel' such as 'المظهر العام والتصميم' (general appearance and design) or 'الشكل والتجربة' (shape and experience).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'organization' is translated as 'مؤسستك' (your foundation/establishment). While technically correct, 'organization' in this context refers to the company, and a better translation might be more aligned with 'شركتك' (your company) or 'هيكلك' (your structure).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'مؤسستك' with 'شركتك' or 'هيكلك' for better clarity and natural flow.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ümumi təəssüratını" (general impression) doesn't quite capture the meaning of "look and feel". It's a bit too broad. A more accurate translation might focus on the visual aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bu bölmə sizə sahənin görünüşünü dəyişməyə imkan verir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "Brendinizə uyğun olaraq" (in accordance with your brand) is slightly formal and could be simplified. It might be more natural to say something like 'Şirkətinizin brendinə uyğun olaraq...' or just 'Şirkətinizin loqosu, adınız və mətninizi...'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Şirkətinizin brendinə uyğun olaraq öz şirkət loqonuz, adınız və mətninizdən istifadə edə bilərsiniz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "sodass Ihr Bereich zum Design Ihres Produkts passt" translates to "so that your area matches the design of your product." The original English says it should match the organization's brand. This is a significant deviation in meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: sodass Ihr Bereich zum Branding Ihrer Organisation passt

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'look and feel' is not directly translated. While 'εμφάνιση και την αίσθηση' is technically correct, it's a bit literal. A more natural translation for 'look and feel' in this context would be something like 'την εμφάνιση και την ατμόσφαιρα' or 'την εμφάνιση και τη διάθεση'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'την εμφάνιση και την αίσθηση' with 'την εμφάνιση και την ατμόσφαιρα' or 'την εμφάνιση και τη διάθεση' for a more natural flow.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'brand' is translated as 'εμπορικό σήμα'. While technically correct, in this context 'brand' refers more broadly to the organization's visual identity. Using 'εμπορικό σήμα' can sound too formal or legalistic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'εμπορικό σήμα' with 'την εταιρική ταυτότητα' or 'το στυλ του οργανισμού' for a more suitable translation in this context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "look and feel" is not ideal. "Convivialité" doesn't accurately convey the visual appearance aspect of "look".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cette sous-section vous permet de modifier l'apparence et l'ambiance de votre espace.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "pour qu'ils correspondent à la marque de votre entreprise" is somewhat redundant.  It literally says "so that they match the brand of your company."  The repetition of 'entreprise' isn't necessary.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cette sous-section vous permet de modifier l'apparence et l'ambiance de votre espace. Vous pouvez utiliser le logo, le nom et le texte de votre entreprise pour correspondre à votre marque.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'space' in the English content is translated as 'կայքէջի' (kaykej’i) which means 'website'. 'Space' refers to a broader area or platform, not just a website. A more accurate translation might be something like 'աշխատասեղանի' (ashxataselani) for 'workspace' or simply 'տարածքի' (taraspaki) for 'area'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'աշխատասեղանի' (ashxataselani) for 'workspace' or 'տարածքի' (taraspaki) for 'area'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The possessive pronoun 'Ձեր' (Dzer) appears inconsistently. While generally correct, consider maintaining consistent capitalization or a slightly more natural flow, if appropriate for the overall tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Review the usage of 'Ձեր' (Dzer) throughout for consistency and natural flow.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Japanese translation uses katakana for 'look & feel' which is acceptable but might be slightly jarring for some users. Consider a more natural Japanese equivalent like 「外観と操作感」 (gaikan to sokuzan kan) for improved readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: スペースのルック＆フィールを変更することができます -> スペースの外観と操作感を変更することができます

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "自社のブランドに合わせて" (jisha no burando ni awasete) can be perceived as a bit formal. A more user-friendly option would better reflect the casual tone of the English original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 自社のブランドに合わせて -> 貴社のブランドに合わせて / あなたのブランドに合わせて

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "look and feel" is not accurately translated. "외관" (ogaan) primarily refers to appearance, not the overall feel or aesthetic. A more suitable translation would convey the broader concept of visual style and design.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 이 하위 섹션에서는 스페이스의 시각적인 스타일과 디자인을 변경할 수 있습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "match your organization brand" is somewhat awkward in the Korean translation. While technically correct, it doesn't flow naturally.  It lacks nuance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 이 하위 섹션에서는 회사 브랜드에 맞춰 회사 로고, 이름 및 텍스트를 사용할 수 있습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "ປະຕູ" (patu) which translates to "door" doesn't fit the context of customizing a 'space'. It should refer to the 'area' or 'environment'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ປ່ຽນແທນດ້ວຍ ຄຳ ວ່າ “ສະຖານທີ່” (sathan thi) ຫຼື “ສິ່ງແວດລ້ອມ” (sing waet lom)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase “ຍີ່ຫໍ້ອົງການຂອງເຈົ້າ” (yi ho ongkan khong chao) sounds a bit unnatural. 'Organization brand' is better translated to something more direct.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ປ່ຽນແທນດ້ວຍ “ລັກສະນະຂອງບໍລິສັດຂອງເຈົ້າ” (laksana khong borisat khong chao) ຫຼື “ຕົວຕົນຂອງບໍລິສັດເຈົ້າ” (tua ton khong borisat chao)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'darbību' (functionality/operation) in 'izskatu un darbību' is not an accurate translation of 'feel' in the English context. It's unnecessary and changes the meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Šī apakšsadaļa ļauj mainīt jūsu portāla izskatu un sajūtu. (This subsection allows you to change the look and feel of your portal.) or simply: Šī apakšsadaļa ļauj mainīt jūsu portāla izskatu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "This subsection allows you to change the look and feel of your space" as "Dana sekcja umożliwia zmianę wyglądu Twojego portalu" is not ideal. "Space" implies a more personalized or custom area. "Portal" is a more generic term. While not strictly incorrect, it loses some of the original nuance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation like "Ta sekcja umożliwia zmianę wyglądu Twojej przestrzeni" or "Ta sekcja umożliwia zmianę wyglądu Twojego środowiska".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'match your organization brand' is translated as 'które będą pasować do Twojej marki'. While technically correct, it's somewhat verbose. A more natural Polish expression would better capture the meaning of aligning with a brand.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider something like 'które będą odpowiadać Twojej marce' or 'które będą współgrać z Twoją marką'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "se encaixe com" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "match". A better translation would convey the idea of aligning or reflecting the brand.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pode utilizar o logótipo da sua própria empresa, nome e texto para refletir/alinhar com a marca da sua organização.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Ace' appears at the beginning of the translation, which is nonsensical and likely a typo. It's an unexpected string and should be removed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove 'Ace'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence 'Această subsecțiune vă permite să modificați aspectul și stilul spațiului dvs.' is grammatically awkward. It's better to focus on 'look and feel' which is captured as 'aspectul și stilul' but the phrasing is not entirely natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing as 'Această subsecțiune vă permite să modificați aspectul spațiului dvs.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'denumirea' translates to 'name', it doesn't fully capture the intended meaning of 'name' in the context of company branding. 'Denumire' typically refers to the formal legal name.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'numele' instead of 'denumirea' to more accurately represent the intended meaning of 'name'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'imaginea de marcă a companiei dvs.' is a bit verbose. 'Brand' is often translated directly in Romanian business contexts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'marca companiei dvs.' instead of 'imaginea de marcă a companiei dvs.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'space' in the English content is translated as 'портал' (portal) in Russian. While 'portal' isn't necessarily wrong, 'space' in this context refers to a customizable area or environment, which might be better conveyed as 'пространство' or another more general term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'портал' with 'пространство' or a more contextually appropriate term like 'рабочее пространство' depending on the specific functionality.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'slogan' is used to translate 'text' from the English content. 'Slogan' implies a short, catchy phrase, while 'text' is more general. This loses some nuance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'слоган' with a more general term for 'text', such as 'текст' or 'описание'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase " රටාව" (ratava) translates to "pattern" or "style" but in this context, "feel" is more appropriate. A better translation would incorporate the concept of overall aesthetic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම අනුකොටස ඔබගේ අවකාශයේ පෙනුම සහ හැඟීම වෙනස් කිරීමට ඉඩ සලසයි.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "විස්තරයක් යෙදීමට හැකිය" (vistharayak yedemito kahitiya) translates literally to "ability to add a description." It's more natural to say "ඔබගේ සමාගමෙහි ලාංඡනය, නම සහ සටන් පාඨය යෙදීමට හැකිය" or "ඔබගේ සමාගමෙහි ලාංඡනය, නම සහ පාඨය යෙදීමට හැකිය." The word 'description' is too broad.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම අනුකොටස ඔබගේ අවකාශයේ පෙනුම සහ හැඟීම වෙනස් කිරීමට ඉඩ සලසයි. ඔබගේ වෙළඳ නාමයට ගැළපීම සඳහා ඔබගේ සමාගමෙහි ලාංඡනය, නම සහ පාඨය යෙදීමට හැකිය.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'look and feel' is translated as 'vzhľad vášho priestoru a dojem, ktorý vyvoláva'. While not incorrect, 'vzhľad a dojem' is a more direct and natural translation of 'look and feel' in this context. The current translation is slightly verbose.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: vzhľad a dojem

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "look and feel" is not accurately translated. "Зовнішній вигляд порталу" (appearance of the portal) is a literal translation but doesn't fully capture the intended meaning of 'look and feel'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: У цьому підрозділі можна змінити загальний вигляд та оформлення порталу.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'to match your organization brand' is missing. The translation doesn't convey the purpose of customization.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: У цьому підрозділі можна змінити загальний вигляд та оформлення порталу, щоб він відповідав бренду вашої організації.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'look and feel' is not accurately translated. While 'giao diện' captures part of the meaning, it primarily refers to the user interface. 'Look and feel' encompasses more than just that.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Phần phụ này cho phép bạn thay đổi diện mạo và trải nghiệm của không gian của mình.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'tổ chức của bạn' is slightly redundant. 'Tổ chức' already implies it's 'your organization'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bạn có thể sử dụng logo, tên và văn bản của công ty để phù hợp với thương hiệu của bạn.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "改变网站的外观" (Change the appearance of the website) is too literal and doesn't fully capture the meaning of "This subsection allows you to change the look and feel of your space."  'Look and feel' refers to the overall design and aesthetic, not just the visual appearance of a website.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 可以调整您的空间外观，使其更具个性化，与您的品牌形象一致。(You can adjust the appearance of your space to make it more personalized and consistent with your brand image.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original English text explicitly mentions the ability to use company logo, name and text. The Chinese translation only mentions the brand image without specific mentioning of logo, name and text.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 可以自定义您的空间，使用您的公司标志、名称和文字来打造品牌形象。(You can customize your space, using your company logo, name and text to create a brand image.)
